!An occupational change means someone with certain abilities and experience gets promoted to a higher-level occupation. An Elven Knight like yourself may change occupations to a *Temple Knight* or a *Swordsinger*. Which occupation do you want to learn about? [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30109/02.htm|Temple Knight] [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30109/05.htm|Swordsinger]Â
